body:
Hi Lars,

This is one of those errors that's never supposed to happen, no
matter what input you give to Radiance or how you set the parameters,
and indicates either a bug in the code or corruption on its input
(e.g., a messed up octree).  I don't know what is causing the problem
in your case, but you could try sending me your scene (to me not to
the group) and I can have a look.

-Greg
